Plot: An idealistic prep school teacher attempts to redeem an incorrigible student.
Title: The Emperor's Club
Writer: Ethan Canin (short story "The Palace Thief"), Neil Tolkin (screenplay)
Actors: Kevin Kline, Emile Hirsch, Embeth Davidtz, Rob Morrow
tomatoConsensus: Though Kline is excellent in his portrayal of Hundert, the movie is too dull and sentimental to distinguish itself from other titles in its genre.
